name: Srcbook
long_description:
Srcbook is an AI powered web application builder.

What if you could build web apps as easily as you make a Figma design or edit a Google Doc?

Enter Srcbook. We've reimagined app development leveraging the awesome new progress we're seeing in AI models. 

Our intelligent environment helps you turn ideas into working applications, whether you know how to code or not. And for those who do code? You'll find all the power and flexibility you need, just without the usual headaches.

Want to launch that app idea? Need to build something for your community? Looking to prototype faster? Start here. We've removed the barriers between idea and execution.

No more choosing between "no-code" tools that limit you or complex development setups. Just pure, joyful building - from concept to launch.

The future of creating for the web is here. We're empowering you to make it.

Our mission is to empower everyone to build for the web.
one_liner: Build web applications in minutes using AI.
